description: Occupying a 17C palazzo in the village centre, this restaurant showcases regional cuisine in all its glory, including specialities such as leek and saffron gnocchi, boiled tongue, pumpkin in the autumn and truffles in season, all accompanied by wines chosen from an extensive wine list. Friendly, informal service, plus an open fire in winter.
